name: Big Chungus Game v0.1
description:
I made a smal game project just to learn, plis download to show your support.

HOW TO PLAY:

Use A and D keys to move and Space to jump

Default u have dubble jump, but if you collect a green "+1" icon, you get tripple jump

First enemy spawns instantly and enemy nr. 2 spawns after the player has collected 5 carrots.

Collect all 10 carrots to win the game

Important!

Updates will come if enough people download the game.
